typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		dimension_key as integer,
		ins as timestamp,
		upd as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dato
dato split(isNull(ins)==true(),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(inserted is null, inserted not null)
ConditionalSplit1@inserted is null derive(ins = currentTimestamp(),
		upd = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn1
ConditionalSplit1@inserted not null derive(upd = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(ins)==false())) ~> AlterRow1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		dimension_key as integer,
		ins as timestamp,
		last_upd as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		dimension_key as integer,
		ins as timestamp,
		last_upd as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['dimension_key'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
